entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
